cards.name: Bloodsail Corsair
cards.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
cards.flavorText: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers. It's called the "Pirate's Code".

cards.name: Bloodsail Cultist
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

cards.name: Bloodsail Deckhand
cards.text: Battlecry: The next weapon you play costs (1) less.
cards.flavorText: Piracy is technically a discount.

cards.name: Bloodsail Flybooter
cards.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
cards.flavorText: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

cards.name: Bloodsail Howler
cards.text: Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
cards.flavorText: They saw their fate a closin' Aboard a pirate ship On deck: The Howlin' Hozen About to let one rip.

cards.name: Bloodsail Raider
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
cards.flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

cards.name: Bloodsail Raider
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
cards.flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

cards.name: Bloodsail Raider
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
cards.flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

cards.name: Bloodscalp Strategist
cards.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
cards.flavorText: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

cards.name: Bloodscent Vilefin
cards.text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Murloc, change its Cost to Health instead of Mana.
cards.flavorText: Tired of eating Jellyfish and Peanut Butter fish, it’s moved on to more gruesome meals.

cards.name: Bloodseeker
cards.text: Honorable Kill: Gain +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: What do you mean shooting them in the back isn’t honorable?!

cards.name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
cards.text: Battlecry: Choose a damaged friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
cards.flavorText: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

cards.name: Bloodworm
cards.text: Lifesteal
cards.flavorText: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

cards.name: Blowgill Sniper
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
cards.flavorText: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

cards.name: Blowtorch Saboteur
cards.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
cards.flavorText: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

cards.name: Blubber Baron
cards.text: Whenever you summon a Battlecry minion while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

cards.name: Bluegill Warrior
cards.text: Charge
cards.flavorText: He just wants a hug. A sloppy... slimy... hug.

cards.name: Bluegill Warrior
cards.text: Charge
cards.flavorText: He just wants a hug. A sloppy... slimy... hug.

cards.name: Blur
cards.text: Your hero can't take damage this turn.
cards.flavorText: "What are you trying to tell me? That I can dodge axes?" "I’m trying to tell you that when you’re a Demon Hunter, you won’t have to."

cards.name: Body Wrapper
cards.text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
cards.flavorText: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

cards.name: Bog Beast
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/4 Muckmare with Taunt.
cards.flavorText: I'm sure at least one of those bones is from an actual beast.

cards.name: Bog Creeper
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavorText: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

cards.name: Bog Slosher
cards.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

cards.name: Bogbeam
cards.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
cards.flavorText: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

cards.name: Boggspine Knuckles
cards.text: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
cards.flavorText: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

cards.name: Bogshaper
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your deck.
cards.flavorText: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

cards.name: Bogstrok Clacker
cards.text: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
cards.flavorText: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

cards.name: Boisterous Bard
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
cards.flavorText: As a kid, she fought with rocks. Now she fights with ROCK!

cards.name: Bola Shot
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and 2 damage to its neighbors.
cards.flavorText: On second thought, bolas aren't very good against flying worms.

cards.name: Bolf Ramshield
cards.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
cards.flavorText: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament. It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

cards.name: Bolner Hammerbeak
cards.text: After you play a Battlecry minion, repeat the first Battlecry played this turn.
cards.flavorText: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

cards.name: Bolster
cards.text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: The best offense is a good defense.

cards.name: Bolvar Fordragon
cards.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavorText: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

cards.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
cards.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavorText: He's so hot right now.

cards.name: Bomb Lobber
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

cards.name: Bomb Squad
cards.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
cards.flavorText: Please don't explode! Please don't explode! Please don't explode!

cards.name: Bomb Toss
cards.text: Deal 2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin Bomb.
cards.flavorText: Me throw face.

cards.name: Bomb Wrangler
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Boom Bot.
cards.flavorText: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

cards.name: Bone Baron
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
cards.flavorText: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

cards.name: Bone Drake
cards.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
cards.flavorText: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

cards.name: Bone Glaive
cards.text: Battlecry: Dredge.
cards.flavorText: Resourceful Demon Hunters find a use for every part of the Demon.

cards.name: Bone Wraith
cards.text: Taunt Reborn
cards.flavorText: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

cards.name: Bonechewer Brawler
cards.text: Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavorText: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

cards.name: Bonechewer Raider
cards.text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
cards.flavorText: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

cards.name: Bonechewer Vanguard
cards.text: Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavorText: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

cards.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
cards.text: Inspire: Gain +1 Health.
cards.flavorText: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones. Okay, maybe just bones.

cards.name: Bonemare
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
cards.flavorText: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

cards.name: Boneweb Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
cards.flavorText: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

cards.name: Bonfire Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

cards.name: Book Wyrm
cards.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
cards.flavorText: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".

cards.name: Book of Specters
cards.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
cards.flavorText: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

cards.name: Boom Squad
cards.text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
cards.flavorText: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

cards.name: Boomkin
cards.text: Choose One - Restore 8 Health to your hero; or Deal 4 damage.
cards.flavorText: Some Druids consider balance to be a state of harmony between the Natural and the Arcane. Others are more focused on the balance of the opponent’s life total versus their own.

cards.name: Boommaster Flark
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
cards.flavorText: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

cards.name: Boompistol Bully
cards.text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry cards cost (5) more next turn.
cards.flavorText: Preventing insults with injuries.

cards.name: Boon of the Ascended
cards.text: Give a minion +2 Health. Summon a Kyrian with its stats and Taunt.
cards.flavorText: Ascension is not some external power granted to you, it is the power you find within yourself.

cards.name: Bootstrap Sunkeneer
cards.text: Combo: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of your opponent's deck.
cards.flavorText: Part of the deck, part of the crew.

cards.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavorText: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

cards.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
cards.text: Taunt
cards.flavorText: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

cards.name: Booty Bay Bookie
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin.
cards.flavorText: Also makes a great librarian. She's really good at fixing books!
